work to be done: The geometry fields are not useful as they are now.  Programming is needed to process the csv file before database load - the processing would create new geometry fields that are Well Known Text representations of each unique set of points (opening, closing, other).  Also need to add foreign key for contextmaster.  Also need to fix code to handle fact that Pottery Interpretation and Micromorphology works in 2017 but not 2016 as that field is not in 2016 files.

fields.name: Source
fields.title: Trench
fields.description: The name of the trench from which this sample was taken.

fields.name: Type
fields.title: Type
fields.description: The type of context

fields.name: Sub-Type
fields.title: SubType
fields.description: The sub-type of context

fields.name: Identifier
fields.title: ContextID
fields.description: The short ID for the context.

fields.name: Title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: A short title for the context.

fields.name: DateEarliest
fields.title: DateEarliest
fields.description: A datetime stamp set when the context record was opened.

fields.name: DateLatest
fields.title: DateLatest
fields.description: A datetime stamp set when the context record was closed.

fields.name: Creator
fields.title: Creator
fields.description: Initials of staff person who created this record.

fields.name: MethodConditions
fields.title: MethodConditions
fields.description: Method of excavation; conditions during excavation.

fields.name: SoilChemistry
fields.title: SoilChemistry
fields.description: Was a soil chemistry sample taken?

fields.name: SlopeDescOpen
fields.title: SlopeDescOpen
fields.description: Context slope at open.

fields.name: SlopeDescClose
fields.title: SlopeDescClose
fields.description: Context slope at close.

fields.name: ColourModifier
fields.title: ColourModifier
fields.description: Term modifying color.

fields.name: ColourHue
fields.title: ColourHue
fields.description: Hue of color.

fields.name: ColourMain
fields.title: ColourMain
fields.description: Main color.

fields.name: ColourMixed
fields.title: ColourMixed
fields.description: Yes or No, is color mixed

fields.name: SoilComposition
fields.title: SoilComposition
fields.description: Describing soil composition, e.g. sandy-silt.

fields.name: CompositionMixed
fields.title: CompositionMixed
fields.description: Yes or No, is the soil composition mixed.

fields.name: SoilCompaction
fields.title: SoilCompaction
fields.description: Degree of soil compaction.

fields.name: InclStoneBuilding
fields.title: InclStoneBuilding
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is building stone.

fields.name: InclStoneUnworked
fields.title: InclStoneUnworked
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is unworked stone.

fields.name: InclPlasterMortar
fields.title: InclPlasterMortar
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is plaster or mortar.

fields.name: InclMudbrick
fields.title: InclMudbrick
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is mudbrick.

fields.name: InclTile
fields.title: InclTile
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is tile.

fields.name: InclPotteryCeramic
fields.title: InclPotteryCeramic
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is ceramics.

fields.name: InclObsidian
fields.title: InclObsidian
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is obsidian.

fields.name: InclShell
fields.title: InclShell
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is shell.

fields.name: InclBone
fields.title: InclBone
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is non-human bone.

fields.name: InclCarbonCharcoalAsh
fields.title: InclCarbonCharcoalAsh
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is charcoal and ash.

fields.name: InclOther
fields.title: InclOther
fields.description: An estimate of percent of context that is something other than defined types.

fields.name: InclOtherDefine
fields.title: InclOtherDefine
fields.description: A description of what is recorded in field InclOther.

fields.name: InclOverall
fields.title: InclOverall
fields.description: An estimate of the total volume of inclusion as percentages.

fields.name: InclSorting
fields.title: InclSorting
fields.description: The degree the inclusions are sorted.

fields.name: InclSizeStoneBuilding
fields.title: InclSizeStoneBuilding
fields.description: The size of building stones.

fields.name: InclSizeStoneUnworked
fields.title: InclSizeStoneUnworked
fields.description: The size of wunworked stones.

fields.name: InclSizeCeramics
fields.title: InclSizeCeramics
fields.description: The size of ceramics.

fields.name: InclSizeShell
fields.title: InclSizeShell
fields.description: The size of shells.

fields.name: InclSizeBone
fields.title: InclSizeBone
fields.description: The size of bone.

fields.name: InclSizeCarbonCharcoalAsh
fields.title: InclSizeCarbonCharcoalAsh
fields.description: The size of carbon pieces.

fields.name: ShapePlan
fields.title: ShapePlan
fields.description: A description of the approximate shape of the context.

fields.name: ContextualDifferentiation
fields.title: ContextualDifferentiation
fields.description: How this context differs from the surrounding contexts.

fields.name: ContextBoundaries
fields.title: ContextBoundaries
fields.description: Defining how sharp is the transition between this context and the surrounding contexts.

fields.name: EqualContexts
fields.title: EqualContexts
fields.description: Indicating other contexts that appear very similar.

fields.name: Contamination
fields.title: Contamination
fields.description: Indicating if there is any form of contamination of the context.

fields.name: Description
fields.title: ExcavationNote
fields.description: The context and any specific conditions as described by the trench supervisor.

fields.name: CoverageAltitude
fields.title: ContextAltitude
fields.description: A calculated value representing the highest and lowest recorded depths of the context (relative to total station master grid).

fields.name: CoverageArea
fields.title: ConverageArea
fields.description: An area calculation derived from all the points taken for the context.

fields.name: CoverageEnvelopeXYZ
fields.title: CoverageEnvelopeXYZ
fields.description: A 2D bounding box of the unionized polygon in the local XYZ grid (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax).

fields.name: CoverageEnvelopeGEO
fields.title: CoverageEnbelopeGeo
fields.description: A 2D bounding box of the unionized polygon expressed in universal coordinate system (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax) as specified in Preferences.JSON

fields.name: CoverageXYZ
fields.title: CoverageXYZ
fields.description: A Well Known Text formatted description of all the points taken in the local grid system.  Warning: this does not actually differentiate consistently between opening and closing perimeters or levels.  Needs work.

fields.name: CoverageGEO
fields.title: CoverageGeo
fields.description: A Well Known Text formatted description of all points take re-expressed from local grid to universal grid.  Warning:  this does not differentiate consistently between opening and closing levels and perimeters.  Needs work.

fields.name: CoveragePosition
fields.title: CoverageCentroid
fields.description: The centroid of the unionized polygon using all points (not just open or close points) expressed in the local grid.  Warning: This should be converted to a WKT field prior to database load.

fields.name: DateModified
fields.title: DateModified
fields.description: A datetime stamp for when record was last modified.

fields.name: DateTimeZone
fields.title: DateTimeZone
fields.description: Names the time zone in which the record was created (and/or nodified??).

fields.name: IdentifierUUID
fields.title: IdentifierUUID
fields.description: A globally unique identifier.

fields.name: RelationIncludes
fields.title: RelationIncludes
fields.description: In iDig a context can include another or multiple other things (e.g. photographs)

fields.name: RelationIncludesUUID
fields.title: RelationIncludesUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the item(s) included in this context record.

fields.name: RelationIsAbove
fields.title: RelationIsAbove
fields.description: Indicates that this context is above the contexts listed here.

fields.name: RelationIsAboveUUID
fields.title: RelationIsAboveUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the contexts below this context.

fields.name: RelationIsAfter
fields.title: RelationIsAfter
fields.description: Indicates this context comes later in time then the listed contexts.

fields.name: RelationIsAfterUUID
fields.title: RelationIsAfterUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the item(s) after which this context comes.

fields.name: RelationIsBefore
fields.title: RelationIsBefore
fields.description: Indicates this context comes earlier in time then the listed contexts.

fields.name: RelationIsBeforeUUID
fields.title: RelationIsBeforeUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the item(s) before which this context comes.

fields.name: RelationIsBelow
fields.title: RelationIsBelow
fields.description: Indicates that this context is below the contexts listed here.

fields.name: RelationIsBelowUUID
fields.title: RelationIsBelowUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the contexts above this context.

fields.name: RelationIsCoevalWith
fields.title: RelationIsCoevalWith
fields.description: Indicates that this context is the contemporaneous to the contexts listed here.  Keros used this field to mean *the same as*.

fields.name: RelationIsCoevalWithUUID
fields.title: RelationIsCoevalWithUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the contexts that are contemporaneous to this context.

fields.name: RelationIsCutBy
fields.title: RelationIsCutBy
fields.description: Indicates that this context is cut by another context.

fields.name: RelationIsCutByUUID
fields.title: RelationIsCutByUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the contexts that cut this context.

fields.name: RelationIsNextTo
fields.title: RelationIsNextTo
fields.description: Indicates this context is directly abutting then the listed contexts.

fields.name: RelationIsNextToUUID
fields.title: RelationIsNextToUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the item(s) directly abutting this context.
